group_1.textLeft: I'll be helping you guys with the Tokime Village's@product exhibition!
There are other staff members who will be assisting@us, so I'll introduce them to you soon.

group_1.textRight: We look forward to working with you!

group_1.textLeft: We got a call from the village last night. I'm sorry to@hear about your troubles.

group_1.textRight: I can't believe none of the adults in the village could@make it...

group_1.textLeft: Please don't worry about it, though— we'll do our@best to help you.
So before the store opens, let's talk about your@responsibilities and how to divide them up.
First, the cashier—
Then Shizuka will be the cashier.
...Are you sure you're okay with that?

group_1.textRight: Part of this is so I can get used to city life.
In order to do that, I should try the things I'm most@unfamiliar with.

group_1.textLeft: That's true— you do have a point.
Next, we'll need someone to stock the shelves, and@finally, someone who can run customer service.
All right.
We have different staff members in charge of each position,
so please ask them for a rundown on what you@should do.
We're almost ready to open.
Until then, you can take some time to rest in@this office.
Oh, and Shizuka, please use this break to review@your work.
Review your work?@What's going on?

group_1.textRight: In the end, I couldn't run the cash register right@even once.

group_1.textLeft: ...Not even once?

group_1.textRight: We're about to open...what should I do?

group_1.textLeft: How are you, Sunao?
Sunao?

group_1.textRight: Oh, I'm sorry— what we were just talking about?

group_1.textLeft: How were things with customer service...?
No, wait, why are you clutching your phone@like that?

group_1.textRight: As a matter of fact, I...received a call from my mom.
She said she and my dad are coming to see the@product exhibition tomorrow...

group_1.textLeft: What? Really?
Isn't it really hard to come here from the village?
Sunao lives in a village just outside of ours.
But even so, I can't believe they'd make that sort@of trip...
...Yeah, I think we are.
If I can't even handle the product exhibition, I@probably won't be allowed to go to Kamihama...
Yes! I'll be right there!

group_1.textRight: Anyway, we should just focus on getting through@the first day for now...right?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yes.
